tool_description: A comprehensive API for searching all types of establishments in the UK, including restaurants, pubs, bars, cafes, coffee shops, and nightclubs. It provides detailed information such as establishment names, addresses, postcodes, food hygiene ratings, local authorities, and geographical coordinates.

api_list.name: Get ratings by restaurant
api_list.description: Retrieve the Food Hygiene Rating for a specified restaurant.

required_parameters.name: restaurant
required_parameters.description: The name of the restaurant for which to retrieve the hygiene rating.

api_list.name: Get all data on an establishment by restaurant
api_list.description: Fetch comprehensive information about a specified restaurant.

required_parameters.name: restaurant
required_parameters.description: The name of the restaurant to retrieve data for.

api_list.name: Search restaurants by town
api_list.description: Find all restaurants located within a specified town or city.

required_parameters.name: town
required_parameters.description: The name of the town or city to search for restaurants.

api_list.name: Search restaurants by local authority
api_list.description: Find all restaurants within a specified local authority area.

required_parameters.name: localauthority
required_parameters.description: The name of the local authority to search for restaurants.
